data.text: @StuffSomersSays it doesn’t mean that much because there’s so much good music released every year, but it’s still something on tv that gathers a giant audience every year
@StuffSomersSays the VMAs and the Grammys aren’t awarding the same thing, and also industry-wise the Grammys are the benchmark (alongside Oscars/Emmys/Tony’s)
@EvanRomano To me an MTV Award means more than a Grammy but to our parents it’s definitely flipped.
@EvanRomano Gotta think about the audience. Not everyone is our age watching this where as MTV awards shows. I also think the Grammys are overvalued.
